summary.event: IEEE Annual Congress on Artificial Intelligence of Things (IEEE AIoT 2024)

awards.best_paper_award: Three accepted papers will be selected for best paper awards.
awards.journal_special_issues: Selected papers will be recommended for potential fast-track publications in IEEE Internet of Things Journal and Digital Communications and Networks.

summary.conference_aim: To bring together universities, research centers, industries, and stakeholders working in AI and IoT to exchange ideas and establish collaborations.
topics_of_interest: Edge AI and Distributed Intelligence
Machine Learning for IoT Applications
Mobile deployment of LLMs
Generative AI and LLMs for IoT applications
AI-empowered Robotics and Sensing for IoT
Smart Cities: AI and IoT Solutions
Security and Privacy in AI-driven IoT Systems
5G and its Impact on AI and IoT
Blockchain Technology for Securing IoT Devices
Human-Machine Interaction in IoT Environments
IoT Sensors and Actuators: Innovations and Advances
AI-driven Data Analytics and Decision-making
Energy-Efficient AI Algorithms for IoT Devices
IoT in Healthcare: Applications and Challenges
Industrial IoT (IIoT) and AI for Manufacturing
Smart Agriculture: AI and IoT in Precision Farming
Ethical Considerations in AI-powered IoT Systems
IoT Standards and Interoperability
Robotic Process Automation (RPA) in IoT
AI-driven Automation in Supply Chain Management
IoT Analytics and Big Data Processing
AI in Edge Devices: Challenges and Solutions
Wireless Sensor Networks in AI and IoT
IoT for Environmental Monitoring and Sustainability
AI and IoT in Transportation and Logistics
Cross-domain Integration of AI and IoT Technologies
Privacy, Security, and Trustworthiness
Standardization and Interoperability
Demonstrations, Proof-of-Concepts, and Deployments

paper_submission_details.extra_page_policy: One extra page allowed with an extra charge of $100
paper_submission_details.review_process: Standard reviewing procedure with at least 3 independent anonymous reviews.
paper_submission_details.publication: All accepted papers will be published on IEEE Xplore.
